Deuteronomy__34.5__Died there: : This last chapter of Deuteronomy, in which the death of Moses is related, was written by Josue, or by some of the prophets.
Deuteronomy__34.6__He buried him: : viz. by the ministry of angels, and would have the place of his burial to be unknown, lest the Israelites, who were so prone to idolatry, might worship him with divine honours.
